definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Hubei Wudang Mountain Tai Chi and other six Lake cableway cableway.
sentences.chinese: 湖北武当山太极湖索道等六条索道。

sentences.english: Hubei Wudang Mountain Tai Chi and other six Lake cableway cableway.
sentences.chinese: 湖北武当山太极湖索道等六条索道。

sentences.english: The detection and check calculations of Jiangjunhe River Cableway Bridge in Yunxi County are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍郧西县汉水将军河索道桥的检测与检算。

sentences.english: Most of my colleagues and I took a shuttle up to and down to the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我和大部分同事都是坐索道上下黄石寨的山。

sentences.english: Smoking is prohibitive in process of the cableway.
sentences.chinese: 索道运行过程中，请勿吸烟。

sentences.english: Pai-Ling Rope way, Taipingshan Logging Railway System, 1968.
sentences.chinese: 太平山森林铁道系统中的白岭索道著点。

sentences.english: The midway of funicular at Chi-Nan Temple, Mu-Cha, Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 木栅指南宫旁大雄宝殿山下的索道台车之中途。

sentences.english: The arrival point of funicular track at Chi-Nan Temple, Mu-Cha, Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 木栅指南宫旁大雄宝殿山下的索道台车之著点。

sentences.english: An aerial cableway is set up across the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 一条架空索道横跨于黄河之上。

sentences.english: The lightning protection and grounding are very important for passenger ropeways safe operation.
sentences.chinese: 防雷接地是保证客运架空索道安全运营的重要环节。

sentences.english: The composition and mathematical model of dynamic weighing system of ore handling cableway are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了运矿索道动态称重系统的组成和数学模型。

sentences.english: A very short track between Yun-Hsian Amusement and the cable car station, Wu-Lai, Taipei County.
sentences.chinese: 乌来云仙乐园与缆车站之间的索道接驳台车。

sentences.english: The routine calculation is the most important content in the design of engineering cableway.
sentences.chinese: 线路计算是工程索道设计中计算量最大的内容。

sentences.english: The funicular track beside the entrance of Kuanyin Temple, Ta-Hsi, Tao-Yuan County.
sentences.chinese: 桃园县大溪镇莲座山观音寺入口处旁的登山索道铁路。

sentences.english: Then, we had taking the funicular.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我们乘坐了索道缆车。

sentences.english: Description is also given to salvage facility and its method of operation in case of break-down of passenger ropeways.
sentences.chinese: 还介绍了客运索道的事故救护设施和使用方法。

definition: plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
